attributes.action: Pay pro-rata pensions to those ex servicemen unfairly excluded'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Until 1975 all servicemen paid equal amounts into a pension fund but only those who completed 22 years service were awarded a pension.
This is disgraceful and one just has to compare the way MPs handled their own pension arrangements to realise how disgusting their response to this unfair anomoly has been.
Pay the Pension      NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
